title: Pool party points are lacking

embed.description: Welcome to Team Up Week! League's better with a party, so from June 15-21, team up with friends and earn points by winning games in five-player premades or sending gifts to friends both new and old. These points pool together to unlock levels of rewards for the whole community to enjoy.

body: cmon guys we need to get that free {{champion:36}} skin we didnt even nudge 5 million in the first day and at this rate we wont get it. we can do this together. I believe in you all...
